title: Global Exchanges Urge SEC to Curb Broad Crypto Exemptions, Warn on Tokenized Stock Risks
contentSnippet: The SEC is being warned not to let crypto firms bypass investor protection rules as it considers exemptive relief for tokenized stocks.

title: Tom Lee softens $250K Bitcoin target, now says year-end ATH is a ‘maybe’
contentSnippet: BitMine chair Tom Lee says Bitcoin’s “best days” are still ahead, but has seemingly eased off his bullish prediction of $250,000 Bitcoin by the end of 2025.

title: ソラナ特化型ウペクシが最大35億円調達、SOL財務戦略などに利用
contentSnippet: ナスダック上場のウペクシが普通株式とワラントの私募により最大2300万ドルを調達すると発表した。調達資金は仮想通貨ソラナ財務戦略と運転資本に充てられる予定だ。

title: セキュリタイズがEU取引決済システム認可を取得、アバランチで展開へ
contentSnippet: セキュリタイズがスペイン国家証券市場委員会からEU全域での取引決済システム運営認可を取得した。同社は米国とEUの両方でライセンスを持つ唯一の企業となり、欧州システムはアバランチ上に展開される。

title: S&P、ステーブルコイン「USDT」のドルペッグ能力を最低評価に引き下げ
contentSnippet: S&Pは、テザー社の米ドルステーブルコインUSDTに対する評価を最も低い「5」に引き下げた。仮想通貨ビットコインを準備資産として保有する割合などに触れ、判断の根拠を説明している。

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: 大口投資家の売りが加速、ビットコイン平均入金額が1年ぶりの高水準に＝クリプトクアント
contentSnippet: クリプトクアントが報告したデータによると、ビットコイン価格が8万ドルまで下落した後、大口トレーダーによる取引所への送金が増加している。最近では9000BTCが送金され、その45%が100BTC以上の大口入金だった。

title: Why Is Bitcoin Down? Blame Trump, Says Economist Paul Krugman
contentSnippet: Bitcoin critic Krugman says it's no coincidence that BTC is down, just as crypto-friendly President Trump stumbles in the polls.

title: Bitcoin shows ‘strong negative correlation’ with USDt activity: Glassnode
contentSnippet: A recent analysis shed light on another correlation between the world’s largest cryptocurrency and stablecoin by market capitalization.

title: Tokenized money market funds surge to $9B, BIS warns of new risks
contentSnippet: On-chain money market funds have grown nearly tenfold since 2023, but the Bank for International Settlements warns their adoption brings new liquidity and contagion risks.

title: New UAE Sweeping Banking Decree Looks to Cement Country’s Global Crypto Position
contentSnippet: UAE’s new financial law brings crypto and blockchain into traditional finance and under Central Bank’s supervision.

title: ビットワイズのドージコインETFも取引開始、グレースケールに続く
contentSnippet: ビットワイズがドージコインETFの取引を米ニューヨーク証券取引所で開始した。管理手数料は0.34%で最初の1カ月間は資産5億ドルまで免除され、グレースケールとREX-オスプレイに続く3番目のドージコインETFとなる。

title: Binance launches concierge crypto service for wealth managers, family offices
contentSnippet: Binance’s latest move targets demand from traditional wealth clients and asset managers taking their first steps into the crypto space.

title: Bitcoin’s path back to $112K and higher depends on four key factors
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s momentum is restrained by uncertainty in interest rate policy, inflation expectations, the pending MSCI decision on crypto-focused firms, and stress in BTC derivatives.

title: ビットコイン、売りは飽和領域に近づくか　K33が長期的な買い場と分析
contentSnippet: K33リサーチは仮想通貨ビットコインが過去最高値から36%下落した現在の相場を「感情主導の行き過ぎ」と分析している。現在の価格乖離が長期投資家にとって魅力的なエントリーポイントと見ている。

title: グレースケール、米国初でジーキャッシュETFの登録申請を提出
contentSnippet: グレースケールが仮想通貨ジーキャッシュ（ZEC）を対象としたETFの登録申請を米SECに提出した。実現すればジーキャッシュに特化した初のETFとなり、同社は過去1カ月間でXRP、ドージコイン、ソラナの投資信託もETFに転換している。

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT Stability to 'Weak' Due to Bitcoin Backing Concerns
contentSnippet: S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Tether's USDT, warning that the industry-leading stablecoin could suffer if Bitcoin's price crashes. Tether disagrees.

title: APT Trades Little Changed, Undeperforms Wider Crypto Market Rally
contentSnippet: The token has support around the $2.16 level and resistance at $2.31.

title: S&P downgrades USDT’s dollar peg rating to lowest score
contentSnippet: S&P Global Ratings downgraded Tether’s USDt to its lowest stability rating, raising concerns over its dollar peg. Tether classified the report as “misleading.”

title: Price predictions 11/26: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, HYPE, BCH, LINK
contentSnippet: Bitcoin and select altcoins have started a recovery, but higher levels are likely to attract solid selling by the bears. Is $100,000 BTC's next stop?

title: Grayscale files with SEC to list Zcash ETF
contentSnippet: The fund, which could be listed on NYSE Arca, would the first ETF tied to a privacy coin, following several other listings from Grayscale and asset managers.

title: Bitcoin Reclaims $90K Ahead of Thanksgiving as Ethereum, XRP Bounce Back
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has broken above $90,000 per coin again, nearly a week after it dipped to a seven-month low of about $81,000.

title: Nasdaq ISE Files to Lift BlackRock IBIT Option Limits Into Top Tier Status
contentSnippet: Filing comes amid rapid growth in IBIT options activity and a migration of open interest toward US regulated venues.

title: House Democrats Issue Report Detailing Trump Crypto Ties as 'New Age of Corruption'
contentSnippet: Democratic staff on the House Judiciary Committee gathered data on President Donald Trump's crypto businesses that reportedly gained his family massive wealth.

title: Bitcoin Retakes $90K in Break From Typical Pre-Thanksgiving Price Action
contentSnippet: Just when traders got used to price declines on the Wednesday ahead of Turkey Day, bitcoin pulled a reversal higher.

title: XLM Edges Higher 2.6% to $0.25 as U.S. Bank Tests Stablecoin Pilot
contentSnippet: Major banking institution selects XLM network for programmable digital currency pilot program

title: South Korea's Top Crypto Exchange to Be Absorbed By Tech Giant in $10.3 Billion Deal
contentSnippet: The pending merger, between Upbit owner Dunamu and payments giant Naver, is reportedly focused on the booming stablecoin sector.

title: Hedera Jumps 1% Breaking Through $0.143 Resistance
contentSnippet: Institutional accumulation drives HBAR above key technical levels as futures launch approaches.

title: Robinhood Stock Rises Following Deal That Could Boost Its Prediction Market Push
contentSnippet: Trading app Robinhood may be looking to launch its own prediction market platform, analysts say, following a newly announced acquisition.

title: DeFi’s $55B Plunge Isn’t the Disaster It Looks Like
contentSnippet: Despite a sharp $55 billion decline in total value locked since October, the DeFi sector remains structurally strong, with rising DEX activity and steadily growing protocol fundamentals.

title: S&P Downgrades Tether's USDT, Citing Falling Bitcoin Prices as Risk
contentSnippet: The ratings agency cited bitcoin's rising share in the stablecoin reserves, making USDT vulnerable to falling prices.

title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Loads Up on Google, Coinbase, Circle and Bitcoin ETF Shares
contentSnippet: Tech investor Cathie Wood's investment firm remains bullish on crypto and AI, adding shares of Google, Coinbase, and a Bitcoin ETF on Tuesday.

title: Grayscale Files to Launch Zcash ETF After Privacy Coin's 1,000% Price Surge
contentSnippet: Grayscale is riding the recent Zcash hype with plans to convert its trust into an ETF.

title: Crypto Long & Short: The Striking Dichotomy in DeFi Tokens Post 10/10
contentSnippet: In this week’s Crypto Long & Short Newsletter, Martin Gaspar shares a snapshot of where we are post 10/10 and where potential opportunities from dislocations may lie. Then, we take a look at investor

title: Polymarket can now operate in US! Texas buys $5M BTC! MON up another 24%!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors were slightly red, with BTC down 1% at $86,600 and ETH down 1% at $2,910, while BNB gained 1% to $856 and SOL held steady at $136. Among top movers, MON (+24%), SPX (+13%), and IP (+7%)

title: Bitcoin and Ethereum Stall as Traders Brace for Holiday Volatility
contentSnippet: Crypto markets stagnate as traders eye potential Thanksgiving volatility, with a $2B options bet signaling a capped Bitcoin rally.

title: MEXC、毎月の準備金監査を導入　Hackenを独立監査人に任命
contentSnippet: 暗号資産取引所MEXCがブロックチェーンセキュリティ企業Hackenを独立監査人に任命し、毎月の準備金監査を導入。初回報告は11月末に公開予定。マークルツリー方式による検証の仕組みも解説。

title: ロビンフッド、予測市場向けデリバティブ取引所を新設　2026年運営開始
contentSnippet: ロビンフッドがサスケハナと提携し、CFTC認可の先物取引所を買収。予測市場事業を強化し、2026年の独自取引所運営を目指す。市場規模は2035年までに955億ドルに達する見込み。

title: 日本の暗号資産規制、具体的な方向性は？──金融審議会WG
contentSnippet: 金融審議会WGが暗号資産規制の報告書案を取りまとめ。資金決済法から金商法へ移管し、インサイダー取引規制や課徴金制度を新設する。銀行子会社の参入も解禁。座長は「お墨付きを与えるものではない」と強調した。
